thread.title: Harbison is ready for the next step
thread.title_full: Harbison is ready for the next step

title: Harbison is ready for the next step
text:
Harbison talks about what's next Brad Franklin CavsCorner.com As eager to get to Charlottesville as just about any other commit in recent memory, three-star playmaker Tre Harbison is well on his way. 
The talented running back from Shelby (NC) Crest, who committed to Virginia in April, signed his financial aid paperwork last Thursday, meaning the coaching staff can have unlimited contact with him in advance of his early enrollment. 
On Monday, Virginia formally announced that Harbison, tight end Christian Baumgardner , and linebacker Matt Terrell had all signed their grant-in-aid paperwork and were set for January arrivals. Recent commit Kenneth Ruff is also planning to enroll early. ... More ... To continue reading this article you must be a member. Sign Up Now!
